body:
Increase the connect timeout for elfutils to 60 sec.  Elfutils (and
bzip2) tar files are on sourceware.org which is often slow to respond.

----------

In addition to bzip2, I've also sometimes had trouble with elfutils timing out,
as in #15212.  So the connection timeout is a welcome addition.

@michaelkuhn Is there a way to specify the fetch options once per package?
Or, is it necessary to add this for every version as in bzip2?
title: elfutils: increase connect timeout
